item.title: Migrating from Wordpress to Hugo
item.description: A clean, static rebuild of my blog using Hugo replaced the security risks, plugin bloat, and performance issues of WordPress with a fast, version‑controlled, fully automated setup; by building a custom migration pipeline to convert messy WordPress XML into structured Hugo content bundles—with local images, cleaned HTML, converted links, and consistent front matter—I ended up with a secure, future‑proof site that’s easier to maintain and far faster than anything I could achieve on WordPress.
